question: Which of the following is an adjective?
Identify the adverb in this sentence: 'He sang the song beautifully.'
Which of these words is an adjective?
Fill in the blank with an adverb: She _____ walked home.
Which of the following is an adverb?
Identify the adjective in this sentence: 'The talented artist painted a beautiful landscape.'
Adverbs can modify adjectives.
Fill in the blank with an adjective: The _____ mountain was difficult to climb.
Which of the following is an adverb?
Identify the adjective in this sentence: 'The little girl ran happily towards her mother.'
Fill in the blank with an adverb: The athlete trained _____ for the upcoming competition.
Which word in the following sentence is an adverb? 'The drowsy cat lazily stretched on the comfortable couch.'
Identify the adjective in this sentence: 'The relentless hiker conquered the treacherous mountain trail.'
Which word in the following sentence is an adverb? 'The curious child inquisitively asked endless questions.'
Identify the adjective in this sentence: 'The rhythmic waves gently lapped against the sandy shore.'
Which word in the following sentence is an adverb? 'The talented musician effortlessly played the complex melody.'
Identify the adjective in this sentence: 'The vibrant sunset painted the sky with brilliant hues.'
Which word in the following sentence is an adverb? 'The graceful dancer graciously accepted the thunderous applause.'
Identify the adjective in this sentence: 'The fragrant flowers bloomed in the meticulously tended garden.'
Which word in the following sentence is an adverb? 'The fearless explorer boldly ventured into the unexplored wilderness.'
Identify the adjective in this sentence: 'The majestic eagle soared gracefully across the cloudless sky.'
Which word in the following sentence is an adverb? 'The patient gardener carefully tended the thriving garden.'
Identify the adjective in this sentence: 'The serene lake reflected the towering, snow-capped mountains.'
In the sentence, 'The swiftly flowing river carved a winding path through the rugged terrain,' which word is an adverb?
Which word in the following sentence is an adverb? 'The tireless athlete tirelessly pursued her ambitious goals.'
